about_the_game:
Get ready to enter the world of Slasho, where your mouse isn’t just a tool—it’s your samurai sword! This isn’t your average roguelike; it's a high-octane, bullet-hell adventure that tests your ability to slice, dodge, and dash your way to victory.

Every enemy you meet is a new test of your gaming skills. They won’t hold back, and neither should you! As you defeat them, you'll unlock awesome abilities that make you even more powerful. Mix and match these skills to suit your playstyle—whether you like to get up close and personal or take out your foes from a distance, 'Slasho' has got you covered.

The action in 'Slasho' is intense, and it’s all about the thrill of the fight. You’ll need to be quick with your moves and smart with your strategy to survive. And the best part? Every run is different, so you can keep coming back for fresh challenges.

So, are you ready to step up, young samurai? 'Slasho' is calling for the bravest gamers to take on its bullet-hell battlegrounds. Grab your mouse and show us what you've got! Can you rise to the top and become the ultimate samurai legend? Let the battle begin!

short_description: Dive into Slasho, a mouse-driven bullet hell roguelike where your precision guides a samurai's blade. Cut through hordes, unlock skills, and face unique enemies in this action-packed quest for supremacy. Are you ready to defy death and embrace the samurai's path?
